item.title: IDCL
item.description: Author: IDCL Editor Welcome to the Initiative on Dravidian Culture & Languages. Initiative on Dravidian Culture and Languages (IDCL) aims to preserve and promote the linguistic and cultural diversity on India and beyond. The project has been established to improve the availability of resources and dedicate digital platforms for the enrichment of languages and cultures. The importance of language preservation has become a necessity in this age of globalisation. More than 3000 languages in the world are considered as endangered.
